entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
